author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Puducherry unit of Students Federation of India (SFI) on Saturday strongly condemned the move of the Ministry of Human Resources Development (MHRD) to seek a probe on a complaint about Islamisation of the Pondicherry University.

A. Anand, secretary of SFI in a statement said that MHRD’s pressure on the University to submit a report should be read along with the situation in Hyderabad Central University where.a similar pressure by the MHRD resulted in the expulsion of five Dalit students forcing Dalit scholar Rohith Vemula to commit suicide.

Anand termed the allegations of Islamisation as totally baseless. The MHRD’s move was an attempt to subvert the educational progress made by Dalits, Muslims and other backward sections, he added further.
title: SFI condemns MHRD move
